values.name: Brite Blinds Ltd
values.description:
Suppliers of made to measure blinds, curtains and awnings in Brighton, Hove, Worthing and surrounding areas.

Brite Blinds supply and fit a wide range of quality made to measure blinds, curtains and awnings at competitive prices in Brighton, Hove, Worthing and surrounding areas. We offer free home visits, expert advice, free measuring and quotations.

values.name: Religion Bar & Club
values.description:
Hove's new bar and boutique club. In a world of nowhere to go Religion is some where to go..Never to cool for school it is a fun and yet beautiful venue ….It guarantees a great night out with gorgeous friendly staff great music and superb cocktails. Sitting is the new dancing and they have created 7 stunning booths that you can book for the night. The most exclusive area though is a VIP mini club over looking the bar that you can book….

For those of you with your dancing shoes they also have a stunning boutique club downstairs where you can dance the night away and the best bit is you will know every song they play. Then again if you fancy dancing in your booth thats fine too. The heated covered outside area is perfect for a smoke and a chat.

Open Thursday ,Friday (till 3am) and Saturday (till 3am) nights with 2 for 1 cocktails on Thursday night and Friday afterwork club (3-8pm) it can’t be missed if your in Hove.

Get home, Get Dressed, Get out, Get Religion.

Prominence Ltd was founded by Mehdi Jahani in 2008. From just four properties in 2009, Prominence Property now manages a number of properties across Brighton and Hove. The growth of the letting agency has been largely due to referrals, which is something we take great pride in.

Mehdi deals directly with the majority of our landlords and knows most of the tenants in Prominence property by name. If you have a question about renting or letting in Brighton or Hove, Mehdi is always more than happy to speak to you. Having lived and working in the city since 2003, he can give you valuable insights into the different areas and into the rental market trends.

All members of the Prominence Property team must complete a National Federation of Property Professionals (NFoPP) technical award in Residential Letting and Property Management. NFoPP works to raise standards within the letting and property management profession and its qualifications are recognised by the Office of Qualifications and Examinations Regulation (Ofqual).

If you are looking for local property rentals & management in East Sussex run by experts or want to get more information before buying your first BTL property, give us a call on 01273 724374
values.name: Prominence Property

values.description:
OfwelTen Hove, Damen & Holmes Advocaten, is een nieuw kantoor in een authentiek pand waarvan de advocaten gezamenlijk  meer dan 60 jaren specialistische ervaring hebben in de juridische advies- en procespraktijk. Wij  richten ons op zowel  de zakelijke markt alsook op particulieren. Wij zijn jonge, gemotiveerde en enthousiaste  specialisten die streven naar een optimaal resultaat  voor u en voor uw zaak in zo kort mogelijke tijd. Onze advocaten zijn modern, werken pro-actief en hanteren concurrerende prijzen. 

ONZE SPECIALISMEN ZIJN
- Intellectuele Eigendom, Handelsrecht, Contracten, ICT, Mededingingsrecht (Ten Hove)
- Ambtenarenrecht, Arbeidsrecht, Militair recht, Strafrecht (Damen)
- Personen- en Familierecht, Jeugdrecht, Erfrecht (Holmes)


VACATURES
We zijn nog op zoek naar uitbreiding van ons professionele team, op rechtsgebieden als arbeidsrecht, bestuursrecht en insolventierecht. Zijn er ondernemende en ervaren specialisten die deel willen uitmaken van ons kantoor en dat als ondernemer? Stuur een mail naar tenhove@tdhadvocaten.nl
values.name: TDH Advocaten L.L.P.
Triple A Event Security
values.description:
Triple A Security have been delivering professional security services across a range of industries since 2008. We  pride ourself on providing trained, professional staff.

We offer a full range of event and security services:
Traffic management
Event security
Event stewarding
Door supervision
Key holding
Alarm response
Risk assessments including fire
Traffic management plans
Event management plans and documentation.

Our clients include Brighton & Hove City Council, Sussex County Cricket Ground and Brighton & Hove Albion.

values.name: Brighton Catering Supplies
values.description:
BCS is a family owned business based in Brighton, servicing Hotel's, Restaurants, Bars and Cafe's all over the UK.  Thanks to the internet it enables us to meet amazing people, running great businesses in all areas of the country.  If you're in Brighton & Hove and the surrounding area then our base on Lewes Road is perfect for you to put your hands on the things you need immediately, as well as getting same day deliveries. 

Next day delivery on orders placed before 4pm as standard.

Free Same Day delivery to Brighton & Hove and the surrounding area.

Open 6 days a week. 

A real person, in our shop to talk to on 01273 35 85 35 as well as a dedicated Account Manager for you.

We make the effort to learn about your business, which means you get the right products every time.

Consistently high quality products at fair prices.

Personal Trainer David Staffell works in Brighton, Hove, Southwick, Shoreham, Rottingdean, Peacehaven and all across the borough of Brighton & Hove. He offers home, office and outdoor fitness training. www.dsfitbrighton.co.uk

His team of experienced, enthusiastic trainers consist of Tom Wilcox, Katie Whittle and Ka-Mun Fung work in Richmond, Twickenham, Sheen, Barnes, Putney, Kew and across south-west London and Surrey. www.dsfit.co.uk

Simonsens Streger
values.description:
Freelance Graphic Designer and artworker based in Copenhagen. Designs, localizes and adapts brochures, pamphlets, adverts, cards, banners, DM, posters, outdoor, stickers, signs, flags, etc. Can handle every aspect of the production process and has a network of printers, photographs, translators, illustrators, etc.

Shell Specialist  
Former Shell employee (1995-2003). Freelancing for Shell since 2003. Simonsens Streger is approved by SQS – Shell Supplier Qualification System. An approved vendor in The Shell SAP-system and has signed a non-disclosure agreement with Shell. Knows the Shell brand guidelines inside out and has access to Shell Brand Central. Can get approval by the Shell VI-checkpoint, via direct access.
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
Søger du en knivskarp grafiker, der rykker hurtigt på opgaverne? Jeg tilbyder grafisk assistance i et fleksibelt samarbejde, hvor jeg både kan arbejde fra din virksomhed og fra min egen adresse.

Simonsens Streger er min lille, dynamiske tegnestue, som klarer en bred vifte af grafiske opgaver – store som små - fra start til slut. Layout og rentegning af annoncer, brochurer, plakater, klæbemærker, messemateriale og meget andet. 

Jeg arbejder bl.a. for dele af Shell i Skandinavien, Benelux og UK, Dansk Varme Service A/S, DCC Energi A/S,  Univar Lubricants i Skandinavien, Masytec A/S, Hove A/S, DLG (Dansk Landbrugs Grovvareselskab), elecom elevatorer, Dansk Vognfjederfabrik m.fl..
